name: Footeez
description: Footeez is a single-player football game where you are a cube and you must power through different levels. Your main objective is to score your ball into the goal on every level. 100% of the money made from this game will go to Enabling Leadership's Just For Kicks, football program. Enabling Leadership is a Non-Profit organization with a mission to teach life-skills to underprivileged children in India. Find out more about Enabling Leadership at https://enablingleadership.org/.  This is an indie game, created by Siddharth Sonnad and Sagar Chakravarthy. We hope you have a blast!
